Chapter 20: The Pure Abodes Celestial Sons Praise in Verses
At that time, the celestial son Power Born spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If all causes and conditions, karma, and the fruits obtained,
The essence of these is all empty, the Buddha has said it is like a lion.
At that time, the celestial son Power of Conformity spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If by the causes and conditions of karma, the fruits are increased,
The Honored One of the Two Legs is able to know, therefore the Buddha is unequaled.
At that time, the celestial son Power of Conformity spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating such a realm, creating such karma,
One will obtain such a retribution, the Buddha eye is able to know all.
At that time, the celestial son Power Arisen spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating such a realm, accomplishing such a nature,
The Buddha knows all sentient beings, just like observing the five fingers on his hand.
At that time, the celestial son Power Practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating such a realm, one encounters such a friend again,
In this way, the supreme person knows all about the close association.
At that time, the celestial son Power Increase spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The guide is able to understand the empowerment in that realm,
The Honored One of Humans illuminates and sees all the close association with friends.
At that time, the celestial son Determined Realm spoke a verse in praise, saying:ğŸ”½The Buddha definitely knows that realm, that commitment, those friends, and that association,
Therefore he is able to remove doubts.
At that time, the celestial son Correctly Determined Realm spoke a verse in praise, saying:
That realm, that continuity, abiding in the world as it is,
The supreme person knows all about the practices and destinies.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Realm of Learning spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In those various realms, the leader's wisdom can know,
That wisdom's essence is empty, the superior wisdom thus speaks.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Realm of Vehicles spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating in those realms, according to the faculties and time abiding in the world,
The Buddha knows all as it truly is, thus he is called the incomparable body.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Realm of Accordance spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating in those realms, according to the merits obtained,
Based on causes and effects, the Buddha knows all without remainder.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Realm of Common Abiding spoke a verse in praise, saying:
According to the cultivated realms, according to the paths they turn to,
The Buddha knows all without remainder, thus he is revered by wisdom.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of Wisdom Practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
According to the realms cultivated, according to the paths they take,
The Buddha knows the activities of sentient beings, thus called the knower of learners.
At that time, the fearless celestial honored one spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Those with right concentration, those with wrong concentration, and those with indeterminate concentration,
Within these three groups, the Buddha is able to definitively know.
At that time, the celestial honored one who practices riding spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If there are sentient beings with right concentration, capable of heading towards nirvana,
The Buddha, the sun for the world, has unobstructed wisdom within them.
At that time, the celestial honored one who practices liberation spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If there are sentient beings dwelling in the indeterminate group,
Falling into the various evil paths, he also speaks nirvana for them.
At that time, the celestial honored one who meets with power spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Buddha is merely a provisional name, power and wisdom are also like this,
And the four fearlessnesses, etc., are only verbally existent.
At that time, the god-son Seeing Reality spoke a verse in praise, saying:
There is no Buddha, no Buddha-dharma, and also no other collection of wisdom,
The TathÄgata truly knows how to reveal the ultimate truth.
At that time, the god-son Abiding in Power spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Abiding in the power of the Buddha-dharma, one thereby attains fearlessness,
Freely following one's desires, all are the Buddha's disciples.
At that time, the god-son Fearlessness of the Dharma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The conventional truth and the ultimate truth, these two kinds are revealed,
Within the ultimate truth, verbal expression cannot be found.
At that time, the god-son Wisdom Honored One spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Dharma and verbal expression are each different, the characteristics of the Dharma are also different,
This verbal expression is without characteristics, the Buddha's wisdom is the characteristic of the Dharma.
At that time, the god son of diligent practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The indeterminate masses in inappropriate places, or heading towards different destinies,
The great sage knows all the places of wrong determination.
At that time, the god son of the power of faith spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Cultivating in those realms, as the mind of faith and delight arises,
Seeing greed as pure, the great sage fully understands.
At that time, the god son of the vehicle of impurity spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Unreal false discrimination, increasing the realm of desire,
Faith then practices that path, the great sage knows it as it truly is.
At that time, the god son of the practice of the vehicle of kindness spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Unreal false discrimination, increasing the realm of anger,
Faith then rides that path, the great sage fully understands.
At that time, the god son of the vehicle of causal paths spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Unreal false discrimination increases the realm of delusion,
If one has faith, one rides that path, the Sage fully understands.
At that time, the god of the heaven of giving up riding, spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For those with the fear of not surviving, jealousy increases,
If one has faith in that, one practices it, the Sage fully understands.
At that time, the god of the heaven of practicing good friends, spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Approaching good and evil friends, one increases that evil realm,
One still has faith in that, Gautama fully understands.
At that time, the god of the heaven of knowing solidity, spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Transmigrating in the world, according to what one cultivates,
In accordance with that, one has faith in it, the Buddha knows all without remainder.
At that time, the god of the heaven of practicing solidity, spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Transmigrating in birth and death, cultivating such practices,
The Buddha knows all of this without exception.
At that time, the celestial son Faith Root spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If there are sentient beings who cultivate according to their realms,
The Buddha is able to understand all of this, and thus is called the one with unobstructed wisdom.
At that time, the celestial son Root Practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Buddha understands the various faculties and how they arise through skillful means,
The objects of perception and their realms, and where they enter and are born.
At that time, the celestial son Vehicle of the Faculties spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The body is oppressed by suffering, due to attachment and craving.
Cutting off all craving, only the Buddha's wisdom is supreme.
At that time, the celestial son Faculties and Objects spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Teaching sentient beings with inferior faculties to distance themselves from attachment to form,
Teaching those with sharp faculties to contemplate - this is what the Honored One of the Two-legged beings says.
At that time, the celestial son Root Excellence spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Those of inferior faculties dwell in emptiness and seclusion, able to extinguish greed and desire,
Correctly contemplating craving and thirst, the Honored One of the Two Feet is able to know.
At that time, the celestial son Root Certainty spoke a verse in praise, saying:
First giving rise to desire, the Buddha observes that there is nothing to be attained,
Knowing non-knowing and quiescent extinction, therefore called the supreme faculty.
At that time, the celestial son Root Non-separation spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Far removed, not angry or enraged, this is the antidote to aversion,
This is practiced by those of inferior faculties, the Buddha knows the desires of sentient beings.
At that time, the celestial son Faith Faculty spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Practicing loving-kindness to remove anger and hatred, able to give rise to the wisdom of sentient beings,
They are able to extinguish the realm of anger, the Honored One of Humans is able to know all.
At that time, the celestial son Seeking Faculty spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Not angry, without faults or evil, compassionate conduct is of the nature of quiescence,
Purity and impurity cannot be obtained, therefore he is called the Honored One among Humans.
At that time, the god Son of Proper Practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Practicing wrong discrimination, speaking of wrong conduct for others,
Heavy with delusion, without skillful means, the Buddha sees the inverted liberation.
At that time, the god Son of Arisen Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Greed, hatred, and delusion, grasping onto past events,
Contradicting and obtaining the bright wisdom, the greatly renowned one knows all.
At that time, the god Son of Separated Wisdom Love spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Greed, hatred, and delusion, as well as the bright and dark matters,
Their nature cannot be obtained, the Honored One of the Two-footed Ones knows all.
At that time, the god Son of Upholding Virtue spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The wisdom obtained by sentient beings, following the amount of wisdom obtained,
The TathÄgata is able to know all, according to the vessels that are perfected.
At that time the Son of Heaven Seeking Roots spoke a verse in praise, saying:
With wisdom knowing wisdom, far removed from all afflictions,
The Teacher of Gods and Humans knows all, therefore I bow my head in reverence.
At that time the Son of Heaven One-Sidedly Delighting in Roots spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The lands and times, observing the methods of the Dharma,
The defilements of afflictions and purity, the TathÄgata knows them all to be empty.
At that time the Son of Heaven Banner of Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The faculties, desires, and faith of sentient beings, the distinctions of superior, middling, and inferior,
The bonds, liberation, and wisdom, all seen without awareness.
At that time the Son of Heaven Banner of Faculties spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The superior, middling, and inferior faculties, afflictions, wisdom, and feelings,
The tamed and the untamed, the Buddha says they are all signless.
At that time, the god Xiugen spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The afflictions of meditation and liberation, right concentration and samÄdhi,
Giving rise to pure beings, the TathÄgata is able to know all.
At that time, the god Liusujie spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Attaining the quiescence of meditation, therefore in the nature of all dharmas,
One is able to understand and know them all, thus called omniscient.
At that time, the god Liqie spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If it is a dharma and its nature, one is able to expound this dharma,
Able to correctly receive it as it truly is, thus not attached to the three times.
At that time, the god Leli spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Afflictions and wrong discrimination give rise to the four kinds,
Able to understand what is produced by karma, thus called the incomparable person.
At that time, the god Zhili spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Able to know the pure dharmas, the antidotes to afflictions,
Able to expound on karma, therefore the Buddha is called incomparable.
At that time, the celestial son Power-Hero spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Arising from dhyÄna, liberation, samÄdhi, and samÄpatti,
Afflictions and purity, the Buddha has all said are false.
At that time, the celestial son Power-Born spoke a verse in praise, saying:
DhyÄna, liberation, purity, samÄdhi, and samÄpatti,
They arise from non-negligence, the Buddha knows all of this.
At that time, the celestial son Power-Increasing spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Great Hero, in this, is able to turn the wheel of dhyÄna and so forth,
Knowing to enter and abandon without obstruction, like the wind moving through space.
At that time, the celestial son Knowing the Past spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For countless hundreds of millions of eons, abiding in various existences,
Not being tainted by faults, he is called the supreme hero.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who Dwells in the Past Limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Having already made offerings to countless hundreds of millions of Buddhas,
Seeking the unsurpassed path, therefore I take refuge.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who Sees the Past Limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In the past, various offerings were made to the Buddhas,
And in various kinds of eloquence, the Honored One among Humans all obtained.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who is Skilled in the Past Limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In the past, wandering in the world, according to the Dharma, learning and practicing,
Having seen countless Buddhas, therefore able to deeply understand the Dharma.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who Studies the Past Limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In the place of the Dharma King, the Great Hero practiced in the past,
Having studied by the Buddha's side, therefore paying homage to the one who knows all practices.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who was originally endowed with skillful means spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For countless billions of eons, practicing the boundless Buddha's way,
Cultivating supreme diligence, seeking the Buddha's wisdom.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who was originally determined in skillful means spoke a verse in praise, saying:
All dharmas are determined, observed for many billions of eons,
All dharmas are without entry, only speaking of the combination of conditions.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who contemplated the past limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For countless billions of eons, the guide has practiced,
Knowing the proper and improper, therefore called understanding the world.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who discerned the past limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Abiding in the proper and improper, observing the causes of karma,
The realms, faculties, meditations, and liberations, the Buddha can know them all.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who contemplated the past limit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In the past, I have observed and contemplated, increasing the power of wisdom,
The one with ten powers, greatly courageous and valiant, observes the world with wisdom.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Realm of the Past Limitless spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Great Hero originally cultivated practices, knowing all sentient beings,
Pure and impure practices, thus able to treat sentient beings.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Contemplation of Past Limitless Practices spoke a verse in praise, saying:
First contemplating the practices of sentient beings in the past,
Faith, joy, and the realms, then treating sentient beings.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Power of Faith spoke a verse in praise, saying:
I now have faith in the TathÄgata, for inconceivable eons,
Observing the practices of the past, the mind is completely unattached.
At that time, the Son of Heaven of the Faith in Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For countless hundreds of millions of eons, contemplating the Buddha's past practices,
Good sons, no one can fathom the virtues of the TathÄgata.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skilled in Observing the End of the Eon spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The TathÄgata, with the Buddha-eye, observes sentient beings in the ten directions,
Their birth and death, and the various karmic phenomena they are associated with.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Who Studies the End of the Eon spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Whether the causes and karmic actions follow the path towards Buddhahood,
The Sage knows them all, and is therefore called the Omniscient One.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Who Perceives Birth and Death spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If sentient beings, with their realms, create various karmic actions through habituation,
The Buddha, with regard to sentient beings and the habituation of karmic actions, has no conceptualization or discrimination.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Who Knows Birth and Death spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Associating with such friends, creating such karmic actions,
Heading towards such a path, the Sage knows them all.
At that time, the skillful celestial son of what is needed spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Able to know what is needed, according to the corresponding work,
Having done such work, the TathÄgata fully understands.
At that time, the skillful celestial son of affairs spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Relying on such affairs, creating such karma,
The Buddha is able to know them all, they are all the Buddha's realm.
At that time, the celestial son who knows affairs spoke a verse in praise, saying:
According to the affairs one clings to, one is able to create,
The Buddha understands all faculties, thus able to know those karmas.
At that time, the celestial son who is skillful in wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If it is wisdom and affairs, the Buddha knows their delusions,
According to their clinging, the Buddha also knows without remainder.
At that time, the celestial son who is skillful in cultivation spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Following attachment and creating karma, due to afflictions,
The Buddha is able to know them all, thus becoming the refuge of the world.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skilled in Destinies spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Following destinies as karma is created, following karma one obtains its fruits,
Following the conditions under which karma is created, the Buddha's eye knows them all.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skilled in Objects spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Able to know the objects, following conditions karma matures,
In the various destinies receiving retribution, the Buddha knows them all without error.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skilled in Habitual Tendencies spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Knowing the habitual tendencies of evil karma, and also of good karma,
Knowing past activities, in the destinies of sentient beings.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skilled in Karma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Able to know the three kinds of karma, present, future, and past,
Sentient beings are confused about this in the realms of existence.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Skillful in Retribution spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Little done can bring great retribution, much done can bring little retribution,
And knowing the equality of much and little, non-Buddhists are confused about this.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Learning Karma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Knowing karma with immediate retribution, and also knowing karma with retribution in the next life,
And karma with retribution in future lives, the Buddha's eye can understand all.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Knowing Karma in the Present Life spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If one creates karma in the present life, one will receive retribution in the present life,
The Buddha can understand this, but ordinary people cannot comprehend it.
At that time, the Son of Heaven Knowing Karma with Retribution in the Next Life spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If one creates such karma, one will receive retribution in another life,
The Great Sage can understand this, but sentient beings cannot comprehend it.
At that time, the god Realizing Retribution said in verse, praising:
If karma is for many koá¹­is of kalpas, then later one will receive retribution,
Or if it exceeds that, the TathÄgata fully understands.
At that time, the god Realizing Karma Not Ripening said in verse, praising:
If the karma one creates, the conditions for that karma have not yet ripened,
And have not yet obtained retribution, the TathÄgata fully understands.
At that time, the god Observing Karma Not Yet Ripening said in verse, praising:
The TathÄgata skillfully observes karma. If the characteristics of karma correspond,
It arises in sentient beings, and he is able to skillfully explain it all.
At that time, the god Skillfully Knowing Karma Ripening said in verse, praising:
If that karma matures, it can give rise to future retribution,
The Buddha is able to know it as it truly is, and also knows that wisdom is empty.
At that time, the god Karma Ripening and Certainty said in verse, praising:
The Omniscient One thoroughly understands light and heavy karma,
And can know the desires of sentient beings, thus becoming my honored one.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who knew the lightness and heaviness of karma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The beings who go to the evil paths, according to their karma, see
That karma, whether light or heavy, the wise one thoroughly understands.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who knew the practices of sentient beings spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Seeing the practices of sentient beings, and the light and heavy karmas,
The Heroic One follows and understands, which non-Buddhists cannot comprehend.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who observed the practices of sentient beings spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Observing the practices of sentient beings, proclaiming the retribution of karma,
Like a vessel with the water of the Ganges, pouring in a single ounce of salt.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who studied karma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If one receives and thinks about karma, the Buddha says that karma is ultimate,
The results of training and no longer training, the supreme sage has already proclaimed.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who delights in the Buddha's wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The Buddha's supreme eye sees in the three realms the foolish and the wise,
Following karma, receiving retribution, seeing the subtle, I pay homage.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who speaks of the exhaustion of karma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In the realm of birth and death of sentient beings, the World-Honored One is the great guide,
Fully understanding without remainder, therefore I pay homage to the fearless one with wisdom.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who attains nothing spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If karma produces birth and death, sentient beings each go their own way,
Their retribution is like a dream, the Honored One with two feet fully knows.
At that time, the Son of Heaven who seeks afflictions spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Greed, anger, and delusion, the Honored One with two feet has completely exhausted them,
Like a thirsty person in a dream drinking cool water.
At that time, the god-son Free from Discrimination spoke a verse in praise, saying:
From discrimination arise greed, anger, and delusion,
Like playing in a dream. I take refuge in the supreme teacher.
At that time, the god-son Cessation of Discrimination spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If discrimination ceases, then afflictions are exhausted,
Like a dream in which clouds disperse. The Honored One among Humans manifests this.
At that time, the god-son Observation of the Cessation of Outflows spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Like seeing a heavenly rain in a dream, the arising of outflows is also like this.
The Great Hero is able to reveal the causes and conditions for the arising of outflows.
At that time, the god-son Observation of Dreams spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Like seeing a great rain in a dream, the arising of outflows is also like this.
The Great Hero is able to reveal that ordinary deluded ones give rise to outflows.
At that time, the god-son Observation of Dreams as Such spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just as in a dream one sees rain falling, giving rise to various defilements,
The Great Hero is able to reveal that ordinary deluded beings give rise to defilements.
At that time, the god son Who Knows the Nature of Things spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just as a woman in a dream gives birth to a child, and after birth it dies again,
Giving rise to joy and also giving rise to sorrow, the Buddha views the world in the same way.
At that time, the god son Contemplating Dreams spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just as in a dream one sees the beheading, exhausting the defilements is also like this,
Liberating oneself and also teaching others, therefore I pay homage to the one who completely understands.
At that time, the god son Cultivating Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Seeing the Dharma one is able to understand, like encountering loved ones in a dream,
Far removed from them, it is not real, in this way one delights the world.
At that time, the god son Mind of Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Hearing the TathÄgata's Dharma, delighting in the Dharma of emptiness,
Just like speaking of dreams within a dream, so it is to understand the world.
At that time, the celestial son Joyful Intention spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The one in meditative concentration can bring joy to the world and devas,
Observing the various destinies, like reflections in a mirror.
At that time, the celestial son Resolute Wisdom spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Hearing the TathÄgata's Dharma, like the sound of a lute,
Crossing over the ocean of doubts of humans and devas, I therefore pay homage to the king among humans.
At that time, the celestial son Illusionary Joy spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just as a person creates illusions to deceive the foolish,
The wise are never deluded, knowing illusions are unreal.
At that time, the celestial son Eliminating Characteristics spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Observing all worlds, like dreams and illusions created,
I have no doubts within them, because I have heard the Buddha's Dharma.
At that time, the celestial son Skilled in Illusion spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just as an illusionist creates illusions, he himself is not deluded by the illusions,
Because he knows the illusions are false, the Buddha views the world in the same way.
At that time, the celestial son Observing Delusion spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Delusion gives rise to the world, the Great Guide knows it all,
Just as one who diligently contemplates the Buddha will see the Buddha in dreams.
At that time, the celestial son Destroying Delusion spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Desire is not produced by things, it all arises from delusion,
Unreal desire arises from delusion, the Honored One among Humans knows it as it truly is.
At that time, the celestial son Understanding Consciousness spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Just like the sounds in a deep valley, their echoes are unreal,
Therefore, one is not attached to the world, thus observing the world.
At that time, the celestial son Expounding Skillfulness spoke a verse in praise, saying:
That sound has no reality, yet within it one hears,
The Honored One of humans proclaims this, rescuing the foolish.
At that time the Son of Heaven Skilled in Practice spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Among the different meanings of the Dharma, beings falsely grasp at differences,
Those who are able to practice know the Dharma, and within it remove doubts.
At that time the Son of Heaven Practicing in Accord with Meaning spoke a verse in praise, saying:
If the meaning and the Dharma are real, there is no one who can understand,
There is no speaking and no realization, the Sage says this.
At that time the Son of Heaven Practicing with the Nominal Dharma spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Afflictions, impurities, outflows, and habits are all falsely discriminated by thought,
Defilement and purity are merely nominal expressions.
At that time the Son of Heaven Skilled in Discrimination spoke a verse in praise, saying:
All are merely names, referring to afflictions, outflows, and so forth,
Defilement and purity are spoken of by the one with great wisdom.
At that time, the god of no dependence spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Not attached to the three realms, the mind is like empty space,
Free from evil, a true field of blessings, I bow my head to the one whose mind is tranquil.
At that time, the god of no inferiority spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Not form, not non-form, not desire, not nirvana,
The Buddha's mind has no support, it is just like empty space.
At that time, the god of no desire spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Free from attachment to the desire realm, form and formless realms are also so,
Liberated from the hindrance of craving, I bow my head to the one who has ended attachment.
At that time, the god of distancing attachment spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Within existence and non-existence, the Buddha has permanently severed and distanced himself,
Not attached to the three realms, I bow my head to the King of Sages.
At that time, the celestial son Obstructing Love spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Obstructing the three realms, practicing the conduct of a great man,
Able to liberate sentient beings, I take refuge in the savior.
At that time, the celestial son Liberated from Thirst for Love spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Far removed from the fetters, in the end exhausting birth and death,
Body and mind both pure, I bow my head to the one without heat.
At that time, the celestial son Knowing Self-nature spoke a verse in praise, saying:
The great hero understands liberation, knowing that phenomena are without affairs,
Without bondage and also without liberation, I bow my head to the one who sees the truth.
At that time, the celestial son Emerging from the Mud spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Far removed from the mud of desire, also detached from all existences,
Without grasping and also without abandoning, I bow my head to the one who ends future existences.
At that time, the celestial son Spitting Out Resources spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Abandoning defilements and resources, renouncing evil and distancing from desire,
Also leaving behind the hindrances, I take refuge in the Great Guide.
At that time, the god-son Renouncing Desire spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Abandoning gain and loss, unattached and determined in practice,
Escaping the web of Mara, I bow my head to the unattached one.
At that time, the god-son Delighting in Benefit spoke a verse in praise, saying:
For oneself and others, the path that is far removed from vexation and heat,
The Great Hero sees that path, I bow my head to the unobstructed seer.
At that time, the god-son Attaining Renown spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Those who accord with the Buddha's wisdom, as taught and as observed,
They are able to eliminate afflictions, I bow my head to the one who understands the world.
At that time, the god-son Fearless spoke a verse in praise, saying:
In all dharmas, there is no one who can oppose
The fearless lion's roar, the ocean of wisdom roars likewise.
At that time, the fearless celestial being in all places spoke a verse in praise, saying:
Skillfully crossing all places, far removing all poisonous arrows,
Fearless and not timid, I pay homage to the most supreme one.
